text:
CGI scripts do not receive any input from POST requests.

GET requets work fine, since the environment variable QUERY_STRING is set.

POST requests do not work, since the output from the server never reaches the
Rexx script.

I'm using charin(,,Length), where Length is equal to the size reported by
CONTENT_LENGTH. charin returns an empty string since it never receives anything
from Tomcat, even though the CONTENT_LENGTH is set to >0.
creator: sehh@altered.com
amyroh@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5899 ***
